channel.title: Need Help In Pascal
channel.description:
How can I create a form in pascal that the user can interact with? Can pascal even do this? Or do all programs need to be run through the command prompt?
Thanks, Quilby
Edit: I think that the thing that I am talking about it called a GUI...
